title: Starling Spur is a high single-pivot steel gearbox mountain bike with 170mm travel
content:
An all-new high single-pivot gearbox mountain bike has fledged the nest of British steel bicycle frame manufacturer, Starling. The Starling Spur runs a 170mm travel rear end on a 29″ platform, and is said to be their best descender ever, ready for double-black runs and alpine seasons. Upon first glance, this looks like a single-speed […]

The post Starling Spur is a high single-pivot steel gearbox mountain bike with 170mm travel appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
